page.title: 05BARCOMBE FIRE STATION.
page.content: {Report by Sarah Broadway.} Mr. Broadway runs Barcombe fire station.He has to teach other firemen basic skills and go out on calls.He enjoys his work very much as it gives him the satisfaction of achieving something. Barcombe is a small village and is very lucky to have a fire station.It can serve a large area which contains many small villages. Of course it would be great if all villages and towns could have a fire station, but that would be too expensive. The type of emergencies Barcombe fire station is called on varies.Most of the fires they attend are chimneys catching alight or common, forest and hedgerow fires.They also attend road accidents. If another fire station is busy, Barcombe have to cover for them.
